summary: Practice Soul Gems is a mod that lets you break down your soul gems at any forge into multiple "practice" soul gems. Practice soul gems produce weaker items, but you can craft many of them at a time to make leveling Enchanting less of a grind.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/hObIhrQ.png[/img][/center]

Practice Soul Gems is a mod that I made for personal use to make the grind of leveling up Enchanting less annoying. If you liked my Revenge of the Iron Daggers and Leather Bracers mod, this might be right up your alley.

This mod adds some crafting recipes that allow you to break down your higher-quality soul gems into "practice" soul gems at any forge. These gems create very weak items when you use them for enchanting, but you can collect a lot of them easily by breaking down your other gems. This lets you crank out a lot of weak items to max that Enchanting skill faster than ever before.

You will require the Arcane Blacksmith perk in order to break down soul gems at a forge, and they can be found under the MISC crafting category. Alternatively, there is a version of the download where no perk is required, for people who want to play pure mage characters and never touch Smithing.

[size=3][b]Soul Gems can be broken down in the following way:[/b][/size]

[b][size=3]Lesser Soul Gem - 2 Practice Soul Gems

Lesser Soul Gem with Lesser Soul - 3 Practice Soul Gems

[b]Common Soul Gem - 4 Practice Soul Gems

Common Soul Gem with Common Soul - 5 Practice Soul Gems[/b]

Greater Soul Gem - 6 Practice Soul Gems

Greater Soul Gem with Greater Soul - 7 Practice Soul Gems

Grand Soul Gem - 8 Practice Soul Gems

Grand Soul Gem with Grand Soul - 10 Practice Soul Gems

Black Soul Gem - 8 Practice Soul Gems

Black Soul Gem with Grand Soul - 10 Practice Soul Gems

[/size][/b]Items in the screenshots come from Immersive Armors and Konahrik's Accouterments. I'd recommend both of them!

I wasn't going to bother putting this mod on the Nexus since it's so tiny and specific to my own annoyances with Skyrim. But hey, if you'd like to make the Enchanting grind a little easier by using this mod, be my guest. If you like the mod and always feel free to leave any comments on the mod page on the Nexus. Thanks.

[SIZE=7]Permissions[/SIZE]

[url=https://robbiemod.wordpress.com/License]https://robbiemod.wordpress.com/License[/url]

- Contact me before using anything from this mod. I will probably say yes.

- If you contact me and I do not respond within 30 days, you have full permission to use this mod, in whole or in part, in any of your work. This includes compilations, conversions, and any derivative works.

- No parts of this mod can be monetized under any circumstances. If you are caught monetizing this work, your permission to use any content from any of my mods is permanently revoked.

- Credit me if you use something from this mod.

- If you use something from this mod, your permissions should be open so other people can use it the same way you did.

[b][SIZE=7]My Other Mods:[/SIZE][/b]

files.name: Practice Soul Gems
files.changelogHtml: - Changed crafting recipes to require soul gems being in the player's inventory before they appear at the Misc. section in the forge to cut down unnecessary menu clutter.

files.name: Practice Soul Gems (No Perk Requirement)
files.changelogHtml: - Changed crafting recipes to require soul gems being in the player's inventory before they appear at the Misc. section in the forge to cut down unnecessary menu clutter.
